title: merch store
body: riot why are the prices so high? {{champion:412}} statue and hoodie are so expensive D:

replies.body: Because it's official merchandise. Every company that sells official merchandise makes it more expensive than your everyday kmart or target shirt.

posters all pretty much suck, only the janna and kat ones even look decnt (and i mean the ones of them only in it)
Really needs more of just the champion 

figures arnt to  bad, needs to cover more of them though (whihc hopefully it will )
dnt see the point in half the tshirts (a logo doesnt ustify the price needs more than just a 2inch pic on it)
I really like that thresh hoodie.
